arguments.name: flags
arguments.description: Flags, see TL conditional fields

arguments.name: phonecallsEnabled
arguments.description: Whether phone calls can be used

arguments.name: defaultP2pContacts
arguments.description: Whether the client should use P2P by default for phone calls with contacts

arguments.name: preloadFeaturedStickers
arguments.description: Whether the client should preload featured stickers

arguments.name: ignorePhoneEntities
arguments.description: Whether the client should ignore phone entities

arguments.name: revokePmInbox
arguments.description: Whether incoming private messages can be deleted for both participants

arguments.name: blockedMode
arguments.description: Indicates that telegram is probably censored by governments/ISPs in the current region

arguments.name: pfsEnabled
arguments.description: Whether pfs was used

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: Current date at the server

arguments.name: expires
arguments.description: Expiration date of this config: when it expires it'll have to be refetched using help.getConfig

arguments.name: testMode
arguments.description: Whether we're connected to the test DCs

arguments.name: thisDc
arguments.description: ID of the DC that returned the reply

arguments.name: dcOptions
arguments.description: DC IP list

arguments.name: dcTxtDomainName
arguments.description: Domain name for fetching encrypted DC list from DNS TXT record

arguments.name: chatSizeMax
arguments.description: Maximum member count for normal groups

arguments.name: megagroupSizeMax
arguments.description: Maximum member count for supergroups

arguments.name: forwardedCountMax
arguments.description: Maximum number of messages that can be forwarded at once using messages.forwardMessages.

arguments.name: onlineUpdatePeriodMs
arguments.description: The client should account.updateStatus every N milliseconds

arguments.name: offlineBlurTimeoutMs
arguments.description: Delay before offline status needs to be sent to the server

arguments.name: offlineIdleTimeoutMs
arguments.description: Time without any user activity after which it should be treated offline

arguments.name: onlineCloudTimeoutMs
arguments.description: If we are offline, but were online from some other client in last online_cloud_timeout_ms milliseconds after we had gone offline, then delay offline notification for notify_cloud_delay_ms milliseconds.

arguments.name: notifyCloudDelayMs
arguments.description: If we are offline, but online from some other client then delay sending the offline notification for notify_cloud_delay_ms milliseconds.

arguments.name: notifyDefaultDelayMs
arguments.description: If some other client is online, then delay notification for notification_default_delay_ms milliseconds

arguments.name: pushChatPeriodMs
arguments.description: Not for client use

arguments.name: pushChatLimit
arguments.description: Not for client use

arguments.name: savedGifsLimit
arguments.description: Maximum count of saved gifs

arguments.name: editTimeLimit
arguments.description: Only messages with age smaller than the one specified can be edited

arguments.name: revokeTimeLimit
arguments.description: Only channel/supergroup messages with age smaller than the specified can be deleted

arguments.name: revokePmTimeLimit
arguments.description: Only private messages with age smaller than the specified can be deleted

arguments.name: ratingEDecay
arguments.description: Exponential decay rate for computing top peer rating

arguments.name: stickersRecentLimit
arguments.description: Maximum number of recent stickers

arguments.name: stickersFavedLimit
arguments.description: Maximum number of faved stickers

arguments.name: channelsReadMediaPeriod
arguments.description: Indicates that round videos (video notes) and voice messages sent in channels and older than the specified period must be marked as read

arguments.name: tmpSessions
arguments.description: Temporary passport sessions

arguments.name: pinnedDialogsCountMax
arguments.description: Maximum count of pinned dialogs

arguments.name: pinnedInfolderCountMax
arguments.description: Maximum count of dialogs per folder

arguments.name: callReceiveTimeoutMs
arguments.description: Maximum allowed outgoing ring time in VoIP calls: if the user we're calling doesn't reply within the specified time (in milliseconds), we should hang up the call

arguments.name: callRingTimeoutMs
arguments.description: Maximum allowed incoming ring time in VoIP calls: if the current user doesn't reply within the specified time (in milliseconds), the call will be automatically refused

arguments.name: callConnectTimeoutMs
arguments.description: VoIP connection timeout: if the instance of libtgvoip on the other side of the call doesn't connect to our instance of libtgvoip within the specified time (in milliseconds), the call must be aborted

arguments.name: callPacketTimeoutMs
arguments.description: If during a VoIP call a packet isn't received for the specified period of time, the call must be aborted

arguments.name: meUrlPrefix
arguments.description:
The domain to use to parse in-app links.
For example t.me indicates that t.me/username links should parsed to @username, t.me/addsticker/name should be parsed to the appropriate stickerset and so on...

arguments.name: autoupdateUrlPrefix
arguments.description: URL to use to auto-update the current app

arguments.name: gifSearchUsername
arguments.description: Username of the bot to use to search for GIFs

arguments.name: venueSearchUsername
arguments.description: Username of the bot to use to search for venues

arguments.name: imgSearchUsername
arguments.description: Username of the bot to use for image search

arguments.name: staticMapsProvider
arguments.description: ID of the map provider to use for venues

arguments.name: captionLengthMax
arguments.description: Maximum length of caption (length in utf8 codepoints)

arguments.name: messageLengthMax
arguments.description: Maximum length of messages (length in utf8 codepoints)

arguments.name: webfileDcId
arguments.description: DC ID to use to download webfiles

arguments.name: suggestedLangCode
arguments.description: Suggested language code

arguments.name: langPackVersion
arguments.description: Language pack version

arguments.name: baseLangPackVersion
arguments.description: Basic language pack version

parent.name: Config
parent.description: Object contains info on API configuring parameters.
